citations.narrative:
There were no records of disposition for two hedgehogs and four Virginia opossums which had been sold within the past
few months. Complete and accurate animal records must be kept current to facilitate identification and tracking of animals
as well as ensure their health and well-being. Records must be maintained which fully and correctly disclose all the
required information concerning all animals purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, transported, sold,
euthanized or otherwise disposed of and shall include any offspring born or hatched while in the licensee’s possession.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There were no records of disposition for two hedgehogs and four Virginia opossums which had been sold within the past 
few months. Complete and accurate animal records must be kept current to facilitate identification and tracking of animals 
as well as ensure their health and well-being. Records must be maintained which fully and correctly disclose all the 
required information concerning all animals purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, leased, transported, sold, 
euthanized or otherwise disposed of and shall include any offspring born or hatched while in the licensee’s possession. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
